overview: It narrates the events of a Galician town in the 50's from the perspective of a seamstress that works for well-placed women. Played by María Mera, Dalia is a dressmaker who lives in the city, a brave and fighter woman. Her unexpected death will take her to a town called Prescedo, where she will discover many things of her past. His arrival will open old wounds in a place full of secrets. But if something is found Dahlia in Prescedo is the admiration, love and passion of two very different men, Gonzalo (David Seijo) and Lourenzo (Xoán Fórneas), whom he will know by chance on his arrival at the town and who will embark on a fierce fight between they get to get to your heart.
title: Dalia e os seus amores
